alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 17 at 4:07AM EST until December 18 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Genesee counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times with deep snow cover and poor visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4284 7820 4300 7809 4307 7811 4306 7853 4299 7895 4288 7889 4279 7890 4276 7900 4251 7942 4259 7884 TIME Y22M12D17T0900Z-Y22M12D18T0000Z COORD...4279 7837 4292 7840 4294 7858 4287 7883 4270 7909 4232 7975 4225 7976 4235 7942 4250 7909 4261 7863 TIME Y22M12D18T0000Z-Y22M12D18T0300Z COORD...4257 7858 4270 7841 4284 7845 4286 7865 4277 7895 4232 7975 4223 7976 4224 7958 4246 7884 4253 7870 TIME Y22M12D18T0300Z-Y22M12D18T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
